successes.title: R10 Quadrotor- powerful, inexpensive, and customizable.
successes.description: R10 is a quadrotor/micro air vehicle, radically designed from the ground up to be extremely easy to build, modify, and fly.

Pledges.description: You're a MAVerick! Mention as one of our awesome backers. Bring on the revolution in aerial robotics!

UAir is not only committed to making micro air vehicles accessible, we are also committed to making tasty beverages accessible.  Our flagship offering in this area is the trusty bottle opener: no longer do thirsty individuals need to hire expensive trained monkey crews to de-cap their bottles.  Never before have bottled drinks been more accessible.
You're a visionary and we want to help you share it with others. Enjoy this UAir MAVerick t-shirt and let everyone know you're in the club. It’s important to wear clothes.

Wait...what if you're shirtless AND thirsty?  It's a risk that we have to live with every day.  Fortunately we have just the thing for you. Not only are you in the club but you're celebrating too. Enjoy the perks of a UAir MAVerick t-shirt and the party with a UAir bottle opener.
The UAir R10 Slot Frame System (SFS). It has it's own acronym because it's so cool. A great frame for your own quadrotor project, just add batteries, ESCs, motors and flight controller.
Thalamus Flight Controller Early Bird Special! See below...
Thalamus Flight Controller.  It’s not just for quadrotors, it can be a motion/orientation sensor or digital compass for your other projects using SPI, or as a computer peripheral using USB!
Motor and ESC bundle.  Four motors, four multi-rotor optimized ESCs, four props and spinners.

Hypo, the GPS/XBee expansion board.  Hypo is used to give autopilot/waypoint flying capabilities to R10, but you can use it as a GPS/XBee module for your other projects using SPI, or as a computer peripheral using USB!
Want to use the R10 with your own flight controller?  Get the R10 frame, four motors and multi-rotor optimised ESCs and props.  Just add your own flight controller and battery!

Hypo + Thalamus Bundle.  The two boards plugged together (with the supplied cable) gives you a highly capable flight controller with GPS autopilot and XBee telemetry! But they’re not just that, use them in your robotics projects, or as computer peripherals.

R10 Standard Early Bird Special! 
The R10 quadrotor system kit!  Please note: you will need to supply your own Spektrum RC transmitter and battery charger.

R10 Standard.  
The R10 quadrotor system kit!  Please note: you will need to supply your own controller and battery charger.
R10 Standard quadrotor system with a Spektrum DX4e RC transmitter.
R10 Advanced.  The R10 quadrotor with upgraded motors, pneumatic landing gear, and Hypo for autopilot/GPS waypoint flying and telemetry capabilities.

R10 Advanced with a Spektrum DX4e RC transmitter. The R10 quadrotor with upgraded motors, pneumatic landing gear, and Hypo for autopilot/GPS waypoint flying and telemetry capabilities; and a Spektrum DX4e transmitter
R10 + Q2, the R10 Advanced with a Quantum Robotics Q2 XBee Handheld Controller (see Update #2 for details).

UAir founders visit you! Tell us where and we’ll make the arrangements. Whether it’s for us to give a presentation at a school or college, or just a day out flying R10s, you decide.  You also get two R10 Advanced Quadrotors. *(Please contact us before selecting this reward!)
Our next product is named after you. You become the figurehead of that product.  You also get an R10 Advanced.
